item.description:
Hey Everyone!

I just recently went to my first trivia night and enjoyed it so much I thought it would be great to get together with the German Club as well for one!

Lets meet on November 16th at RiRa's pub and put our brains together and win us some trivia-fame in Providence. The pub-quiz starts at 8 p.m., but lets meet around 7.30 pm. to get in a warm-up drink and snack and good seats.

Hope to see many old and new faces for a night of fun and laughs:-)!

Now start reading the Wikipedia... :-).

See you on the 16th!!

Hanna
item.name: Lets put our brains together at a trivia night at RiRa's pub!
